From: 
To: 
Cc: MEMIn.
Subject: FW: U.S. v. Maxwell, S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - Letter re Proposed Limiting Instructions 
Date: Mon, 22 Nov 2021 14:03:54 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.11.22 Letter_ to _ Judge_Nathan _ re _Limiting_Instructions.PDF 
Inline-Images: image001.gif; image002.jpg 
The defense wants to respond to our letter on the jury instructions later. 
From 
Sent: Monday, November 22, 2021 12:42 AM 
To: 
Cc 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] U.S. v. Maxwell, 52 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - Letter re Proposed Limiting Instructions 
Dear Chambers — 
With apologies for the delay, attached please find the defendant's letter regarding the proposed limiting instructions in 
the Court's Opinion and Order, dated November 19, 2021. The defense submits this letter temporarily under seal. 
Regards, 
COHEN & GRESSER LLP 
New York. NY 
1-,  __ 
view bio 
www.cohengresser.com 
New York I  Paris I  Washington 
DC I 
London 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this e-mail may be confidential and/or privileged. This e-mail is intended to be reviewed initially by only 
the individual named above. If the reader of this e-mail is not the intended recipient or a representative of the intended recipient. you are hereby notified that any 
review. dissemination or copying of this e-mail or the information contained herein is prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error. please immediately notify 
the sender by telephone and permanently delete this e-mail. Thank you.
